snippet.title: Official Trailer for Small People Defense
snippet.description:
Challenge yourself in this 3rd-person TD game by rushing waves to get huge rewards and optimizing your cash production. Or enjoy casually powering up your towers and growing your small person into the largest in the world!

Available on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2239870/Small_People_Defense/
